# Hello

## My name is Vlad Tomutiu

Hi, my name is Vlad Tomutiu — a student-athlete at Chaminade University! I am a Data Science Major, as well as a member of the Men's soccer team. I would like to continue my soccer career after college and become a sports analyst or statistician after my playing career.

## Background

-   Junior, B.S. in Data Science, Analytics, and Visualizations at Chaminade University

-   Chaminade University men's soccer

-   Associates in Mathematics at Cañada College (3.9 GPA)
